title: UnderStack Location Types
description: Hierarchical location type configuration schema for Nautobot location organization

locationType.description: A location type definition with optional nested children

description.description: Human-readable description of the location type

content_types.description: List of Nautobot content types that can be associated with this location type (e.g., 'dcim.device', 'ipam.vlan', 'ipam.namespace')

nestable.description: Whether this location type can contain nested locations of the same type

children.description: Child location types nested under this location type
